items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t come to terms with what had happened.

You\'re still too young to get a driver\'s license.
Tom didn\'t have to eat that if he didn\'t want to.
Tom is a picky eater and seldom tries anything new.
Tom is one of the best players we have on the team.
Tom is studying hard so that he can pass the exams.
Tom was in a fight last night and lost a few teeth.
Tom didn\'t think he\'d ever get used to Thai food.
